narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Lantern Counseling LLC is a Counselor, Professional provider based in Ada, MI. From 2022-08 through 2024-12, this provider received $466K in Medicaid payments across 6K claims serving 2K beneficiaries, billing 3 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: 98% of all billing comes from a single procedure code: 90837 (90837). This extreme concentration is unusual and may indicate specialized services or a narrow billing pattern.
Spending more than doubled from $45K in 2022 to $213K in 2024 (377% growth).
Saw a 4.7× spike in 2023 ($45K → $208K), a sharp year-over-year increase.
